name: Fresh Produce Consortium
membership: Freshfel Europe - European fresh fruit and vegetable association
goal: The Fresh Produce Consortium is the UK trade association for the UK fresh produce and cut flower industry.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: EU plant health, pesticide residues, food law, transport, imports, food security
